meanings.sent1: She was unchairing the cat gently.
meanings.sent2: He unchaired himself and walked to the window.
meanings.sent3: The unchairing of the sleepy toddler led to giggles.
meanings.sent4: The magician unchaired the volunteer with a flick of his wand.
meanings.sent5: The unchairing process was swift and efficient.

meanings.definition: To cause to stand up from a seated position.
meanings.sent1: The teacher was unchairing the students for the activity.
meanings.sent2: The announcement unchaired everyone in the waiting room.
meanings.sent3: The unchairing of the audience surprised the performers.
meanings.sent4: His words unchaired her from her doubts.
meanings.sent5: The unchairing command made everyone rise quickly.
